text: Eastman Canyon Creek is a perennial stream in Santa Clara County, California, United States. The headwaters rise on the eastern flank of Croy Ridge in the Santa Cruz Mountains, and flow eastward, eventually emptying into the Uvas Reservoir. Eastman Canyon Road follows alongside the creek for most of its length, ending at the intersection with Uvas Road. ==See also== * Riparian zone * List of watercourses in the San Francisco Bay Area == References== ==External links== * Map of Eastman Canyon Creek Category:Rivers of Santa Clara County, California Category:Rivers of Northern California
title: Eastman Canyon Creek
